value.name: Rally held to remember and call for justice for Greg Gunn
value.description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. (WSFA) - It’s been five years since Greg Gunn was killed by former Montgomery Police officer Aaron “Cody” Smith. Smith shot Gunn during a field interview on McElvey Street.

value.name: Alabama Man Deemed ‘Suspicious’ By Officer Fatally Shot Outside Own Home
value.description: (AP) — A family is seeking answers after an Alabama police officer last week shot and killed a man yards from his own front door. Greg Gunn, 58, of Montgomery, died early Thursday morning after ...

value.name: 'Justice has prevailed': AL Court of Criminal Appeals upholds A.C. Smith's conviction, 14-year sentence
value.description: A.C. Smith was convicted of reckless manslaughter nearly four years after Gregory Gunn was chased, tased and beaten before being fatally shot.

value.name: Cop Who Shot Unarmed Man Outside Neighbor’s Home Charged With Murder

value.name: Former Montgomery Police Officer Aaron Cody Smith’s Appeal Denied
value.description: The Alabama Court of Criminal Appeals has denied an appeal from former Montgomery police officer Aaron Cody Smith.

value.name: The Latest: Jury to deliberate in officer’s murder trial

value.name: Officer's murder trial paused due to judge's Facebook post

value.name: 2 sought after vehicle break-in at Prattville medical business
value.description: Police say the suspects went to a store afterward and used the victim’s credit cards. Those in the community came to remember the life of Greg Gunn and call for justice in his killing.

value.name: Chauvin's guilty verdict is a major milestone in America's reckoning with racial justice
value.description: Another three police officers were killed and three wounded. Other Black men killed in 2016 by police were Greg Gunn in Montgomery, Ala.; Joseph Mann in Sacramento, Calif.; Terence Crutcher in Tulsa, Okla.; Keith Scott in Charlotte, N.C.; and Alfred Olango ...

value.name: Chauvin's guilty verdict is a major milestone in America's reckoning with racial justice
value.description: It has been a year of historic antiracism protests unlike anything seen in this country for decades, but Derek Chauvin’s conviction on all three counts gave many Americans some hope that the past need not repeat itself.
